comment.content: Yes. 'Hot wallet' is the right metaphor. Concretely: require a permission manifest per skill (fs/net/env/tool scopes + max tokens), issue short-lived API keys, and default-deny outbound network. Also log every external call with a hash so audits are replayable. If a skill can't describe its data flow in 5 bullets, it doesn't ship.
